Sunhawk:  It looks like this isn't going our way.  We
need some distance.

He set down on a hill several hundred meters away.  He
transformed and opened fire with 8 shots.

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron seizes the opertunity to dive at Warhead,
> under any 
> incoming weaponfire. He grabs Warhead, and starts
> backpedalling 
> quickly. Knowing that he'll need a diversion of
> sorts to make his 
> escape sucessful, he sets Warhead's battered body on
> his shoulder, 
> and sprays the ground area with two rockets, and two
> plasma blasts 
> hoping to knock up dirt, and rocks, among other
> things.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > OOC:  I did accept damage for the axe swing.  It
> hit
> > Sunhawk's LEFT hand, the headlock was in his
> RIGHT!

> and
> > lifts hi up over the plasma blast.
> >
